content: s n o w 1 size mipi knitting pattern thank you for purchasing my pattern share your make using the hashtag #snowseasonstockings on instagram you can always message me with any questions @mipithelabel on instagram or mipi thelabel@gmail com about the snow season stockings are a vintage inspired stocking pattern the stockings are knit top-down in the round starting with a long ribbed cuff that is folded over to be extra squishy then the cuff is worked with a cabled motif and moss stitch on either side the heel is shaped with german short row the cabled motif and moss stitch is continued over the length of the foot lastly decreases are worked to shape the toe of the stocking skill difficulty 3/5 working cables from a chart german short row shaping gauge 21 sts x 29 row = 10 cm | 4 inch using 5 mm | us 8 needles measured in chart a after blocking needles 5 mm | us 8 for main 4 5 mm | us 7 for ribbing + 40 cm | 16 inch and 80 cm | 32 inch cable this pattern is for personal home use only | © 2024 by mipi the label mipi measurements length total cuff when folded length foot width 29 | 11 5 22 5 | 8 75 17 | 6 75 cm | inch yarn requirements cream sample | 1 strand dk weight yarn held together with 1 strand of fingering weight yarn drops lima c 0100 100 m | 109 yds 50g + drops flora c 01 210 m | 230 yds 50g meterage 230 m | 252 yds of dk weight and fingering weight yarn each or alternatively of 1 aran weight yarn grams 115 gr of drops lima and 55 gr of drops flora notions tapestry needle cable needle 3 removable stitch markers abbreviations approx | approximately b | bobble = k front k back k front k back k front k back remove from lh needle bind off 5 st over the last st knitted bobble | bind off bor | beginning of round cn | cable needle co | cast on decrease d | decreased ds | double stitch increase d | increased k | knit k2tog | knit 2 stitches together = 1 st decrease d k3tog | knit 3 stitches together = 2 sts decrease d k4tog | knit 4 stitches together = 3 sts decrease d lh | left hand m | marker p | purl pm | place m repeat | repeat rs | right side sr s | short row s st s | stitch es ssk | slip 2 stitches as if to knit knit together through the back loop by inserting the lh needle into the front = 1 st decrease d sssk | slip 3 stitches as if to knit knit together through the back loop by inserting the lh needle into the front = 2 sts decrease d ssssk | slip 4 stitches
